supersnek

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • objectdraw.ActiveObject
        • supersnek.World
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class World
extends ActiveObject
    Main thread of the program executes here through ActiveObject
    Author:
    Noah Overcash (smileytechguy@smileytechguy.com)
